title: Social Media Manager
job_overview:
We are seeking a creative, data-driven Social Media Manager to lead and execute our social media strategy across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of growing online presence, engaging audiences, and driving results through organic and paid strategies. This role requires a strong understanding of social media tools, analytics, and current trends, particularly within fast-moving digital environments.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement an effective social media strategy aligned with business goals

Create, curate, and schedule high-quality content (visuals, videos, and copy) across platforms including Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and others

Engage with followers, respond to comments and messages, and manage interactions professionally

Build and manage affiliate partnerships in alignment with campaign strategies

Monitor, track, and report on performance metrics such as engagement, reach, and conversions

Plan, execute, and optimize paid social media campaigns

Stay informed on evolving trends, tools, AI solutions, and best practices in the social media landscape

Collaborate with marketing and design teams to ensure unified messaging and branding

Conduct competitor analysis and provide strategic insights for improvement

Ensure consistency in brand voice and visual identity across all channels

Qualifications and Requirements:

Minimum 2–3 years of proven experience in a similar role

Strong portfolio showcasing successful campaigns and measurable results

Proficient in social media management tools, analytics platforms, and advertising dashboards

Experience in managing ad budgets and achieving ROI-driven results

Excellent content creation and copywriting skills

Strong communication, organizational, and time management skills

Ability to analyze data and translate findings into actionable recommendations

Experience managing multiple brands or social media accounts is preferred

Up-to-date with social platform algorithms, tools, and emerging technologies

Able to work independently and meet deadlines consistently

Additional Requirements:

Submission of a portfolio or samples of social media accounts previously managed is required

How to Apply:
To apply, please submit the following:

Updated resume

A brief cover letter outlining your experience and suitability for the role

Portfolio or links to social media profiles you have managed

Intro video

Optional: examples of paid campaigns and the results achieved

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
